page.title: 17 The Unionist Club.
page.content: We interviewed the chairman.He told us that skittles and drinking were popular activities.People go to the club for a drink and a chat,sometimes bringing a guest who hopefully may decide to join.They have a few plans for the future,to have gas central heating built in and to have the rooms redecorated.The hall is used for wedding receptions and parties. Sometime in the year the blood donors come and use the hall as a hospital to take blood. The back of the club is grassed and this is used for bowls and other outdoor activities. One interesting fact concerning membership is that members should also belong to the Conservative Club.Whether all members actually vote Conservative is another matter.
